title: (Delegation Of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Commercial Vehicle
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Commercial Vehicle 

Roadworthiness (Vehicle Testing) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited commercial vehicle roadworthiness (vehicle testing) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2025

title: (Delegation Of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: 2. The Commercial Vehicle Roadworthiness
text_raw:
2. The Commercial Vehicle Roadworthiness 

(Vehicle Testing) 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 513 of 2023) are revoked.
text_norm: 2 commercial vehicle roadworthiness (vehicle testing) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2023 (s.i no 513 2023) revoked

title: (Delegation Of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations substitute Schedules 1, 2 and 3 to the Commercial Vehicle 
Roadworthiness (Vehicle Testing) (No. 2) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 347 of 
2013) – CVR vehicles and test fees. 

 
 
 
 
 
 10 [674]
